message.body: Maya is soooo exited to see you tonight. But make sure lights are off for Maya at 9 and 9:30 for Lucas. Sunday earlier. 8:30 and 9. And they have to brush teeth and Maya has to pipi before bed. Thanks!!!!!
On plane! Xoxoxm
Perfect! Have a great time on your trip!
Good morning!!! How is everything? Are both kids there?
Can I call you guys?
Just called u.
Ingrid pleaseeeee!!!!
Oops!! I picked up but then couldn't here anything!
ï¿¼We are in your bed
Want to call back on the home phone?
Ok, just please keep that phone handy. R u and Maya in the playground?
Haha nooo She woke up at 7:30omg
So we had breakfast and played and then I told her I needed an hr nap so she's in bed w me watching tv while I tried to lay down
And I tried to pick up the phone when you called actually but spoke into it and nothing happened? I pushed the green button??
I called both parents for their play dates and neither picked up so we will go get lunch and I'll call again?
Oy that's so weird she woke up so early!!! Prob over exited that u r there. :)
But omg haha im not used to having a kid wake me up at 7am w so much energy lol I am impressed w you
She's like 'ITS dAYTiMe INgRiD!!!! iM TUrNiNG ON ThE LighTs!!!!!!'
Hahahahahahaha
It was horrible lol
She never does! Robin will come get Maya at 12:30 so be home. Then they will come back sometime after 5.
Shit i am sorry. She always sleeps in. I am telling u she is hyper exited.

Ok perfect. I called her but she didn't pick up, but we are here. I have my phone on my I was just napping in your bed since like 10am-except not really bc maya is watching tv and the strawberry shortcake girls have very high pitched voices
Lol also every five minutes maya says ARE YoU DoNe YoUR nAP ??? Hahahahaha Lololol
It's ok I gave up anyway
Well, she will be gone soon. :) you can nap in the gigantic bed.
I will lay down for an hour after their play date
Yeah that's where we are! Haha
It was really hard to get her to sleep last night too. She kept getting out of bed to come into your room to show me things lol
So I'm Extra surprised she's so awake
Wait but call your house phone again bc I'm telling you, I picked it up
Oh oh oh, well, u have to be firm tonight. In bed by 9 lights off.
I didn't call home, I called your phone. We never use that phone. I'll call u in a bit. Sorry she was so intense.
I didn't
Telemarketing prob
You just press the green button right?
Ooooh ok! Hahha
Nicole said you called the house phone
Well someone did call the house phone like an hr ago
And I picked up and said hello and waited but no one said anything so I hung up :)
Yeah :) k I'll turn my phone ringer on
Do the parents have my phone number or should I keep calling Brandon's dad?
He didn't pick up
They both have your number and Brian will call you around 5 to tell you what time Lucas is coming back. Might come then or later if he wants to hang out longer. Same Robin.
Oh ok perfect
No one picks up their phone! Brian also called you.
Do you have Skype in your phone?
Haha we are all playing phone tag
I turned on the ringer and have it on me now- I'm sorry I thought they were calling the house phone
Do u have skype in your phone?
No ..
Ok let me call your phone and see if Maya wants to say Happy bday Mom. Prob not since she is watching tv.
Just called u. I give up. Call me when she is done w episode
